EmailTemplate.name: Colorado Professional Development Day - Oct. 2008
EmailTemplate.subject: Financial Aid Training Event - American Student Assistance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending American Student Assistance Professional Development Day on Oct. 15, 2008 at University Center at Chaparral.
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
We look forward to seeing you at future ASA events.
All of ASA's training events are offered free of charge. Training is considered one of the guarantor's core responsibilities and ASA is dedicated to providing informative and useful training events for our industry colleagues.
Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions
Check our website for future training oppurtunities. http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
Sunsara "Sunny" Staninger
Regional Account Executive American Student Assistance (ASA) Office: (800)999-9080 x 2106 sstaninger@amsa.com www.amsa.com
